data.title: Apartments and Townhomes Orion Township
data.meta_description: Heron Springs Apartments are Michigan Luxury apartments located at Lake Orion. Visit our website for more information.
data.text:
about

Heron Springs is a for-lease townhome & apartment community on the edge of Oakland Township, Rochester Hills and Auburn Hills, in the epicenter of Oakland County, Michigan located in beautiful Lake Orion. This multi-family community opened in 2016 and boasts the finest finishes & features that apartment living can offer. Here you will experience maintenance-free resort-style living. It’s truly a home of which you can be proud.

Heron Springs shares the same qualities of all Moceri properties with classic architecture, attention to detail, desirable finishes, and stunning views in well-positioned an in a natural setting.

Heron Springs is close to M-24, I-75 and M-59, providing residents easy access to dining, recreation, and workplace destinations. Our community is close enough to the hustle and bustle to be convenient, yet the natural surroundings provide tranquility after a long day.

Moceri Companies started building custom properties four generations ago. Founded by Detroit grocer Sabastian “Buster” Moceri, who relied on his relationships with area farmers to acquire choice land for future development, the company has become Metro Detroit icon of quality building. Day-to-day operations and concurrent construction are handled by the fourth generation of Moceri's. Brothers Frank, Dominic J., and Mario proudly carry on the tradition of their family’s more than 50 years of experience in quality development, construction, financing, consulting, and architectural design.

We now have five rental communities currently operating, in addition to our single-family home and condominium developments. These properties span Oakland Township, Northville, Bloomfield, Orion Township, Macomb, South Lyon, and many other prime locations.

In addition to building superior properties, the Moceri's believe they have an obligation to uphold the beauty and serenity of our natural surroundings. Therefore, each of their properties is built with the Green Initiative in mind.

4100 Heron Springs Blvd., Lake Orion, MI 48359
